feature: This news website is built using JavaScript, HTML, and Tailwind CSS to create a fast, responsive, and visually appealing user interface. User authentication is securely managed with Firebase Authentication, enabling smooth sign-in and personalized experiences.
This is a full-stack project. It is a food services website. Here users can add foods for sale and see the food list and details.This website has user authentication, a private route
